content:
The maths dept in Utrecht is advertising an Assistant Professor position in pure math.

We welcome applications from across the broad field of pure mathematics, including Analysis, Differential Equations, Geometry, Topology, Algebra, Number Theory, Representation Theory, and Logic.

The logic group has a strong focus on type theory and formalization of maths. It is led by Paige North and me, and we have a group of postdocs and PhD students whose research all touches on these topics one way or another.

For more information: https://www.uu.nl/en/organisation/working-at-utrecht-university/jobs/assistant-professor-in-pure-mathematics

If you are applying, please follow the instructions on the page linked above, but feel free to also reach out to me via DM.
